data.question: What is the BET surface area of Fe2(dobdc) after desolvation?
What is the maximum O2 uptake capacity of Fe2(dobdc) at 211 K?
Does Fe2(dobdc) preferentially bind O2 over N2?
At what temperature is O2 uptake in Fe2(dobdc) fully reversible?
What is the selectivity factor of Fe2(dobdc) for O2 over N2 at 0.21 bar?
Is the O2 adsorption in Fe2(dobdc) irreversible at room temperature?
What is the coordination mode of O2 to iron in Fe2(dobdc) at low temperature?
What changes in the Mossbauer spectra of Fe2(dobdc) suggest the formation of Fe(III) at higher temperatures?
data.answer: The appearance of high-spin iron(III) components

data.question: Is the interaction between Fe2(dobdc) and O2 at low temperatures static or dynamic?
data.answer: It is not possible to determine from the Mossbauer spectral results

data.question: Does Fe2(dobdc) undergo electron transfer processes similar to non-heme iron-containing enzymes?
What is the role of Fe2(dobdc) in potential O2/N2 separation processes?
data.answer: Fe2(dobdc) selectively adsorbs O2, making it a promising material for O2/N2 separation

data.question: Can Fe2(dobdc) operate as an O2 separation material at temperatures close to ambient?
data.answer: Efforts are underway to synthesize related frameworks that can operate closer to ambient temperatures

data.question: Is the O2 adsorption capacity of Fe2(dobdc) affected by cycling at a rapid rate at 211 K?
data.answer: No noticeable loss in adsorption capacity after 13 cycles

data.question: What is the O–O separation distance in Fe2(dobdc) when oxidized at room temperature?
What is the potential utility of Fe2(dobdc) beyond gas separation?
data.answer: Exploring its use as a catalyst for the oxidation of hydrocarbons by air

data.question: Is the interaction between Fe2(dobdc) and O2 at room temperature reversible?
What is the coordination geometry of Fe(II) centers in Fe2(dobdc) after desolvation?
What is the role of charge transfer in the selective binding of O2 over N2 in Fe2(dobdc)?
data.answer: Charge transfer from Fe(II) to O2 results in a larger initial isosteric heat of adsorption for O2, contributing to its selectivity over N2

data.question: Does Fe2(dobdc) feature coordinatively unsaturated Fe(II) centers?
What is the significance of the high O2/N2 selectivity of Fe2(dobdc) at low temperatures?
data.answer: It suggests that Fe2(dobdc) could be an effective material for O2/N2 separation at temperatures higher than those currently used in industrial settings
